name: Emeraldium
description: Once upon a time, there was a land full of colourful gems that was worth a fortune! Treasure hunters from all over the world raced against each other, for the ones who claimed the land first would be billionares! From beautiful beaches to dangerous caves, this is the enchanting place also known as… Emeraldium! Claim the island full of emeralds in this exciting match-3 adventure!
